snippet: Apartment sales increased primarily because of an increase in market demand while prices essentially remained flat despite low inventory.
abstract: New York City’s major real estate firms report that Manhattan apartment sales rose in the third quarter of 2012 to the highest level since the financial crisis began, despite low inventory, as demand and consumer confidence strengthened.
lead_paragraph: Apartment sales increased primarily because of an increase in market demand while prices essentially remained flat despite low inventory.

headline.seo: Manhattan Apartment Sales Rose in Third Quarter, Reports Find
headline.main: Manhattan Apartment Sales Rose Last Quarter, Reports Find
headline.print_headline: Apartments Sold Better Last Quarter, Reports Find
